Blog.post: Hey guys! From now on, i'll be using Xanga as my permanent Blogsite. This would probably be my last post. Thanks to you all! If you stil want to know what's going on with my life..Check out my Xanga.. Anyway, here's the url: http://xanga.com/simplywicked03... See yah there!

I'm lazy. Honestly, I dunno what to write. I'm a bit confuse. Confuse about how I really feel. Classes would about to start in a week or so. And I feel that i'm not ready yet. Clouds of dread starts to form over my head..Eep.. Wahaha! I'll no longer use Xanga . Mark.my.words. I'll just open it once in a while. It's difficult to insert HTML tags there. I'm having a hard time since i'm not really good at it.

My day didn't turned out well because of something..Well, it was really annoying. Can't tell you what it is because it's too personal. My site's really improving . Look at it now, it looks better than it is yesterday. I've signed for a Xanga account again. I think i'll use it as my Blogsite `cuz there are so many things i could do there. Eer, honestly, it's better than Blogspot. Naughty gurl should rest nah! Bye!

Whoah! Hell, yeah! My Blogsite's improving a lot. Thanks to HTML books and HTML codes..It looks nice...I'm looking forward to our computer class cuz I'm so eager to learm HTML nah! Haha! Hafta Go! Gotta sleep early..
Hmmm..What's up with me? I dunno..There are so many little boring things that happens to me everyday..All of which are nonsense.. Ü Okay. I'll just blog again later..

Today, i went out with my friends (gurlz only). I had fun. Honestly, Spending my day outside with my friends is much more fun than being stuck on our house.. Nagpapicture kme ..We watched Shrek 2 and after that..We all went home nah!! I realized that it's better pala to go out with my Girlfriends only. Mas enjoy kxe pag all gurls lang, pwede mag-gurltalk..

Yesterday, i didn't get the chance to go online. I'm so annoyed about it. I just can't last a day without surfing the net. This morning, i opened my Friendster account, and i was surprised to found out that i already have 28 friend requests, 4 testimonials, and 6 messages. Not long after that, i again received messages... Haha! Hmmm..That's it.. Whatever!
I dunno where to start. I think there's nothin' really important in my life that is worth for y'all to read.. Blog again later! See Yah!
Well, I've signed up for a new Chatterbox `cuz the first one i've put isn't working.
What the hell? The chatterbox isn't working..Why? Oh,why?..
Hmmm..I'm bored. Right now, i'm making some stuffs to make this blogsite look nice. Today was just another boring day. It's raining and it's so cold...Ü

There was a girl, who's world was made of dreams, and wishes she lived in them, until one day she woke up, and saw the reality that gripped her. The veil of dreams, and wishes fell, and she saw the awful truth The reality was the opposite of the dreams and wishes It was harsh and cruel and it hurt. So she forgot her dreams, and her wishes and she let reality choke her until she gave up and now all that's left of her dreams, and wishes are the tears that silently roll down her cheeks ^For me, that poem was great. I found the poem when I was browsing at Gurl.com. Hope y’all like it.
Heart of Gold urlLink What is Your Heart REALLY Made of? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

I’m really unhappy about my life. It’s really disappointing. Imagine, being stuck on our house for two hot months. Nothing special has happened. Nothing. Oh, what a summer bummer! Our class starts on June 7. But I feel a little less glum as the rainy days of June chase away what’s left of the summer sun. Why? It’s just because I wasn’t able to enjoy and make the most of it. I think this is my worst summer ever. If only I could turn back the hands of time, maybe my life wouldn’t be as miserable as it is right now. On the bright side, this summer gave me the opportunity to think about things that matter in my life. Things that would make an immense change in my life. Because this past year, I’ve made big choices that I’m regretting up to now. And this school year would give me a chance to start again. I’m really excited about it. Hope that I’ll be off to a good start!
It's already 12:46 am. Yeah, i have to go.

Uh-oh! Well, this is my second time to sign up here in Blogspot. I've already tried other blogsites but i think Blogspot is really the best. Woohoo! Anyway, in this site, you'll learn something about me, things that i wouldn't normally say..`cuz oftentimes, i tend to mess up verbally..that's why sometimes i prefer being quiet and i just end up bottling up my feelings..
